DESCRIPTION: When you obtain #b4 #yBonding, choose #b1 of #b3 random effects to receive. The effects are slightly stronger than potions.
Whenever you or Dragon attacks, the attacker gains #b1 Aggro. The character with higher Aggro becomes the #yFront, taking all attacks.
The Rear is not attacked by enemies.
The #yFront becomes the #yRear, and vice versa. Switch happens when the #yAggro of the #yRear becomes higher than the #yFront.
Taunted enemy will always target who taunted it, ignoring #yFront.
If You attack or an enemy attacks You before the effect kicks in, it is cancelled.
A potion which deals #b30 damage to an enemy.
